What to do with this application ?

Based on the New York Times APIs, you can :
 * Be informed of the last Top Stories
 * Be informed of the Most Popular Articles
 * Be informed of the Top Stories about Sport
 * Do research with publication dates, key words or categories
 * Be notified if articles corresponding to your research has been published
What you should know about this application ?

To do research :
 * Enter at least one query term
 * (Optional) Enter a begin date manually or by picking the back arrow
 * (Optional) Enter a end date manually or by picking the back arrow
 * Check at least one category

To enable notification :
 * Enter at least one query term
 * Check at least one category
 * Pick the switch button
 You will be notified at 6PM each day if there is new articles for you
 
 Disable notification before changing parameters
